This is her primary activity. Her secondary activity is the sale of all kinds of decorations and ornmanents, but only in special occasions such as national holidays and Christmas. She will use the loan to buy some Christmas products and also for some of the essential expenses for things that her little children need. The group "Vecindad del Cinco" is grateful to all the people who help them through Kiva and Edaprospo. Señora Elsa gives a personal testimony and says, "I feel happy and content that people from different parts of the world can help me to continue growing as a person, a woman, and a mother. I promise to continue advancing and within a short time I want to be able to open a bigger food business and share this story with you."

loans.use: to purchase toys and Christmas ornaments

loans.name: Unidos Por Jehova Group

texts.es: Saludos desde Perú!!! Este es el Grupo “Unidos Por Jehová” conformados por 06 socios trabajadores y pasan al ciclo 02. Giuliana  forma parte de la directiva y es la que preside al Grupo. Giuliana tiene 23 años, conviviente con 03 hijos menores. Giuliana tiene un puesto donde se dedica hace más de 01 año a la venta de comida y ayuda con los gastos del hogar. Actualmente vive junto con su abuelita quien le ayuda en el cuidado de los niños. Giuliana solicitó el préstamo para mejorar su puesto de trabajo, para la compra de utensilios de cocina  e insumos. Su sueño de Guiliana es de tener su casa propia y comprar una moto. Esta agradecida con los inversionistas Kiva por permitirle seguir creciendo su negocio. Giuliana es la tercera del lado izquierdo viste polo negro y buzo azul.
texts.en:
Greetings from Peru!  

This is the “Unidos por Jehová” (United for Jehovah) communal bank; it has six, hardworking members who are going through the second cycle.  Giuliana is part of its governing board, she’s group president.

She’s 23-years-old and has a spouse and three minor children.  Giuliana has had a food stand for more than a year where she sells food to help cover household expenses.  She currently lives with her grandmother who helps her care for her children.  

Giuliana requested the loan to improve her stand, to buy kitchen utensils and to buy ingredients.  Her dream is to have a house of her own and to buy a motorcycle.  She’s grateful to Kiva lenders for making it possible for her to continue growing in her business.  

Giuliana is third from the left wearing a black shirt and blue sweatshirt.

loans.use: to buy kitchen utensils and ingredients.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy supplies, expand working capital and develop one of her bestselling pastry products.

loans.name: Merlinda

texts.en:
Merlinda  is married with four children. She  is 47 years old and lives in Goin, Liloy, Zamboanga del Norte.

Merlinda  sells a variety of products to earn a living and has had this business for two years. Each month, she earns 2000 PHP doing this type of work. She has requested a loan of 14,900 PHP to purchase more stock for her general store such as shampoo, toothpaste, soap, etc.

Merlinda  has been a member of PMPC for three years. In the future, Merlinda  hopes to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more stock for her general store such as shampoo, toothpaste, soap, etc

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks and beverages

loans.name: Ali

texts.en:
Ali is 23 years old and comes from Gaza. He has owned a shop for electrical materials and household goods since January 2011. He asked Ryada for this youth loan in order to buy electrical  and other goods for his shop.

Ali hopes that this loan will help him increase his customers and improve his income.

loans.use: to buy electrical materials and other goods for his shop

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more vegetables to resell

loans.name: Alice

texts.en:
Alice is 57 years old, married, and has two children.  She is a mixed crop farmer,  which she has been doing for 10 years.  She earns a monthly income of  6,500 KES, which she uses to support her family. 

Alice is requesting her second loan from KADET LTD, which she will use to buy seedlings and fertilizer for her farm. With the anticipated profit from the business, she will educate her children.  Alice hopes to buy a piece of land, practice large scale farming, and improve the living standard of her family.

loans.use: to purchase seedlings and fertilizer for her farm.

loans.name: Mariya

texts.ru:
Мария живет в Виноградово. Она занимается сельским хозяйством, выращивая ранние овощи на продажу, а именно помидоры, огурцы и капусту. У Марии 50 соток земли и 5 теплиц. Она – замужем, у нее двое сыновей. У обоих сыновей – врожденная проблема со зрением: старшему сыну – 27 лет, он видит только на 50%, а у младшего, которому всего 11 лет, - только 30% зрения, вследствие чего в семье постоянно есть дополнительные расходы. 
Марии необходим кредит в размере 15 000 гривен для того, чтобы закупить семена, минеральные удобрения, дрова для отопления и пленку для теплицы. Со временем Мария надеется построить еще одну дополнительную теплицу, чтобы расширить хозяйство. А дополнительную прибыль от этого капиталовложения Мария надеется вложить в операцию одного из сыновей по коррекции зрения.
texts.en:
Mariya lives in Vinogradovo. She is engaged in agriculture, growing early vegetables for sale; namely tomato, cucumber and cabbage. Mariya has 50 acres of land and five greenhouses. She is married and has two sons. Both sons have congenital eye problems: the eldest son is 27 years old with only 50% vision, while the younger, only 11 years old, has only 30% vision. Consequently, the family always has extra costs. 

Mariya needs a loan of 15,000 hryvnia (UAH) in order to purchase seeds, chemical fertilizer, firewood for heating, and plastic sheeting for greenhouses. Mariya eventually hopes to build yet another greenhouse to expand her household business. With the additional profit from these investments, Mariya hopes to invest in vision correction surgery for one of her sons.

loans.use: to purchase seeds, chemical fertilizer, firewood for heating, and plastic sheeting for greenhouses.

loans.name: Ysaias

texts.es:
Ysaías tiene 30 años de edad, es conviviente y tiene 2 hijos, Vive en casa propia, la cual está ubicada el Caserío Pedregal Alto del Distrito de Tambogrande. Cliente vive en la parte rural  de este distrito. Y solo cuenta con servicio de energía eléctrica.

La actividad que desarrolla Ysaías  es la ganadería contando con 30 ovinos y 20 aves de corral (gallinas, pavos), los cuales cría y engorda para luego comercializarlos en el mercado local, además se dedica a la compra y venta de limón en el mercado local de la zona, cuenta con más de 8 años en su negocio.
 
Ysaías desea invertir en la compra de alimento balanceado para el engorde de ovinos y aves de corral para su engorde y venderlos a un mejor precio, esta inversión le permitirá seguir creciendo en su negocio y así mejorar su calidad de vida.  Por ello ha solicitado un crédito de 2000 nuevos soles en Edpyme Alternativa para lograr su objetivo.
texts.en:
Ysaías, 30, lives with his life partner and two children is his own house in Caserío Pedregal Alto in the rural section of Tambogrande district, which only has electricity service. Ysaías raises livestock and has 30 sheep and 20 poultry (chickens and turkeys) that he fattens to sell at the local market. He also buys and sells lemons at the market and has been in business for eight years.
 
Ysaías wants to buy nutritious feed to fatten the sheep and poultry and sell them at higher prices. This investment will let him grow his business and have a better life. He is applying to Edpyme Alternativa for a loan of 2000 nuevos soles to meet his objective.

loans.use: to buy nutritious feed for his livestock.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase merchandise to sell

loans.name: Yousef

texts.en:
Yousef is a 30-year-old single young man. For the past eight years, Yousef has been driving a taxi, which has been a profitable project and the only current source of income for him, but he needs some support from time to time to cover his costs. 

Yousef is requesting a loan from FATEN to help him cover the costs of insuring and licensing the taxi he drives and making some necessary repairs such as changing mirrors and lights. This will increase the taxi capacity to work extra hours and enable Yousef to take additional internal and external requests, which will improve his income positively.

Yousef is photographed inside his taxi.  

Note: Yousef sold his mobile phone store and got back to driving a taxi which he's owned for eight years.

loans.use: To Insure and license his taxi and make some necessary repairs

loans.name: Flor De Jakarey Group

texts.es:
Las mujeres del comité son de la Cuidad de Caacupé, donde ellas se esmeran por ir creciendo. Las señoras del comité son personas muy trabajadoras, ellas están muy agradecidas con la fundación porque están recibiendo ayuda y están creciendo.
La presidenta, la señora Zunilda, está casada y tiene hijos, ella se dedica a la venta de productos de limpieza. Ella junto con sus compañeras realiza constantes actividades y de ese modo fomentar la integración entre las compañeras.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de insumos para poder seguir haciendo sus productos de limpieza, como ser aromatizantes, cloro, y demás, y así seguir creciendo.
texts.en:
The women of this committee are from the city of Caacupé, where they strive to keep growing. The members are hardworking women who are extremely grateful to Fundación Paraguaya for the assistance they have received, which has enabled them to grow.

The group president, Sra. Zunilda, is married and has children. She sells cleaning products. Zunilda and her fellow group members engage in constant activities that help to encourage teamwork.

She is requesting a loan in order to buy supplies for making cleaning products, such as air fresheners, bleach, and other items. This will allow her to continue growing.

loans.use: to buy air fresheners, bleach, and other supplies used for making cleaning products.

loans.name: San Isidro Group

texts.es:
Las 15 mujeres de este grupo, se encuentran en el 4to. Ciclo. Una de las miembros  es la Sra. Celia, ella tiene una despensa en su casa, está acompañada con el señor Hugo, quien es agricultor, tienen un hijo por quien ambos se esfuerzan para poder darle todo lo mejor que pueden. Celia cuenta que por medio de su negocio también puede ayudar a su marido con los gastos del día a día.
Celia quiere poder seguir dando una buena variedad a sus clientes, y es por ello que solicita el crédito, para la compra de bebidas, carne, pollo, embutidos, lácteos y demás productos para poder surtir su negocio y seguir creciendo.
texts.en:
The 15 women of this group are in their fourth loan cycle. One of the members is Sra. Celia, who manages a food pantry in her home. She is married to Sr. Hugo, who is a farmer. They have a son, so they both strive to provide everything for him the best way they can. Through her business, Celia is also able to help her husband with the daily expenses.

Celia wants to continue offering a good variety of products for her customers, so she is requesting a loan in order to buy beverages, meat, chicken, sausages, dairy products, and other items that she needs to restock her business and continue growing.

loans.use: to buy beverages, meat, chicken, sausages, dairy products, and other items.

loans.name: Mujeres Unidas De Fernando Group

texts.es:
El comité "Mujeres Unidas de Fernando" lleva mas de 4 años de organización y trabajo  con la Fundación Paraguaya , sus integrantes fueron mejorando en su trabajo y cada día están mejor, eso por las capacitaciones y el apoyo que reciben.
La Sra. Claudia es una mujer de escasos recursos, que por medio del reciclaje de artículos, como ser cartones, plásticos, aluminio de demás. Claudia cuenta que su trabajo es muy sacrificado y muy cansador, pero que por medio de este esta dando a su familia lo que necesitan, esta muy orgullosa de lo que hace, pues no tiene que hacer ningún trabajo deshonesto, pues este es un trabajo digno y honesto.
Solicita de este crédito para la compra de plásticos, aluminio, y cartones en cantidad, los cuales quiere poder vender y tener mayor ganancia para poder seguir ayudando a su familia.
texts.en:
The committee named “Mujeres Unidas de Fernando” (Fernando’s United Women) was organized more than four years ago and works with Fundación Paraguaya. The members have improved in their work and are getting better each day as a result of the training seminars and the support they have received.

Sra. Claudia is a woman with limited resources. For this reason, she recycles materials such as cardboard, plastics, aluminum, and other items. Claudia says that her work requires great sacrifice and can be very tiring, but it allows her to provide what her family needs. She is very proud of what she has accomplished since she has never had to gain anything through dishonest means. Her job gives her a way to make a decent and honest living.

Claudia is requesting a loan so that she can buy plastics, aluminum, and cardboard in quantity that she can sell. This will help her achieve better earnings so that she can continue helping her family.

loans.use: to buy plastics, aluminum, and cardboard that she can resell.

loans.name: Niño Jesus Group

texts.es:
El comité Niño Jesus nace mediante la gestión y el apoyo de un grupo de mujeres que se encontraba trabajando en dicho lugar, quienes quisieron ayudar a otras mujeres a poder progresar de la misma forma en la que ellas pudieron hacerlo.
La Sra. Lourdes, una de las miembros, es una persona que desde siempre ha trabajo y ha demostrado que quiere salir adelante y superarse. Vende ella todo tipo de prendas y lencería, tiene gran clientela, ya que siempre trae artículos novedosos que ofrece a sus clientes y de esa forma los atrae. Lourdes sueña con poder tener el día de mañana una gran tienda y así seguir trabajando, y dar fuente de trabajo a otras personas.
Pide esta ayuda para poder comprar lencería para hombres y mujeres y así tener buena variedad de prendas que ofrecer a sus clientes.
texts.en:
The group Niño Jesus formed through the administration and support of a group of women who found themselves working in the same place and they wanted to help other women be able to progress in the same way that they had been able to. 

Mrs. Lourdes is a member of this group, she is a person that has always been working and has shown herself to want to be successful and to better herself. She sells all kinds of garments and lingerie. She has a lot of  customers since she always has new items with her that she can offer her customers and in this way she is able to attract a following. Lourdes dreams of being able to have her own store one day and to continue working and to give a place to work to other people. She is asking for this loan in order to purchase more lingerie for men and women and to be able to have a greater variety of garments to offer her customers.

loans.use: purchase lingerie to sell.

loans.name: Michael

texts.en:
Michael is 21 years old, single, and has one child.  He resides in Pasihagon, Siquijor, Siquijor.  Michael's source of income is from fishing so he is challenged to have more fishing materials to earn more income for his living expenses. 

Michael is requesting a loan for 3,000 PHP, which he will use to purchase fishing materials.  He had been a member of PMPC with no negative credit records. In the future, he would like to expand his business.

loans.use: to purchase fishing materials.

loans.name: Onesmas

texts.en:
Onesmas is a 44-year-old married man. He has two children with ages ranging from 8 years to 12 years. He describes himself to be focused. He operates a grocery business where he sells bananas. He has been involved in this business for 10 years. His business is located at a populated business environment and his primary customers are local residents. 

He describes his biggest business challenge to be quick perishability of food. He will use the Kes 10,000 loan to buy bananas to sell. His business goal is to be a supplier of bananas  within 5 years. He hopes that in the future, he will educate his children with profits generated from the business.

loans.use: to buy bananas to sell

loans.name: Gabriel

texts.en:
Gabriel, 43, lives in a village in the town of Tiribe with his wife and five children. He has always worked in animal selling; he buys and sells them at the market. He says that it is a demanding business since he has to walk through the remote areas of the community looking for goats. He’s had his business for three years; thanks for his determination, he has been able to get good results.

Gabriel is asking for his fourth loan with Yehu to invest it in his business. He plans to buy more goats for resale. He promises to repay his loan as scheduled so as to take more loans.The decision to continue working with loans is in order to improve the business and have better income. His plan is to generate higher income to improve his family’s standard of living.

loans.use: to buy more goats for sale.

loans.name: Mary

texts.en:
Mary is a small-scale farmer from Ndaragwa town in the Mt. Kenya Region. She has been practicing mixed farming for the past twenty years. Her main produce is cabbages which she sells to the local market. Farming has been her main source of income over the years. 

Mary is aged fifty-six years and married with six children, two of whom are currently attending school.

She has requested her first loan of 30,000 KES (Kenyan Shillings) from Juhudi Kilimo in order to buy a water pump. She is going to install this pump in her farm for irrigation when there is drought. Mary says that she will be able to have vegetables throughout all the seasons now that she has a way of fighting drought. She plans to expand her farming in the near future by planting tomatoes and onions as well.

loans.use: To buy a water pump.

loans.name: Lucy

texts.en:
Lucy is aged fifty, a farmer in Nkubu county in Kenya, where she lives with her husband and four children; three of them are schooling. She has been in farming for over twenty years producing milk and cash crops which  she sells to the people around her area.

She is requesting 50,000 KES loan from Juhudi Kilimo to purchase materials for constructing a zero-grazing unit that will help her in feeding and taking better care of her dairy cows which will give her more production and more income to help her boost her livelihood and pay school fees for her children. She aspires to have more than five dairy cows in the next five years.

Poor market and lack of farm inputs are her major challenge in farming.

Lucy is grateful to Juhudi Kilimo for the faster processing of loans.

loans.use: To buy  materials for  construting a zero-grazing unit

loans.name: Narantsetseg

texts.en:
Mrs. Narantsetseg is 48 years old and lives with her husband and two daughters in their house in Han-Uul district of Ulaanbaatar, Mongolia. Her husband Baatartsogt, aged 47, drives a taxi and provides taxi service to local customers. Her two daughters Namuundari and Dorjhand, aged 23 and 21, are university students. 

Mrs. Narantsetseg  worked as a teacher at a local school until 2006 and from 2007 she started her own business of clothes tailoring in a rented workplace, running her business successfully until now. She has built a close relationship with her customers and suppliers and she has been covering family expense and their two daughters' school-related expenses from her business profit. 

Mrs. Narantsetseg  is planning to renovate her house before the harsh Mongolian winter comes and she is requesting 6,000,000 MNT to install a floor heating system in order to stay warm during the harsh and cold Mongolian winter. She is a talkative, welcoming and hardworking person.

loans.use: to install a floor heating system in order to stay warm during the harsh and cold Mongolian winter

loans.name: Anjie

texts.en:
Anjie is 27 years old, married, and has one child.  She lives in Lutao, Panaon,  Misamis Occidental. Anjie is engaged in banana cue and pork barbecue selling business.  She earns approximately 4,500 PHP each month.  

Anjie is requesting a loan, which she will use to purchase additional meat and bananas for her business. She has been a member of PMPC for two years. In the future, Anjie hopes to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase meat and bananas.

loans.name: Nizomudin

texts.ru: Низомудин житель района Шахритус. Ему 28 лет. Он женат. У него трое детей. У Низомудина при доме имеется небольшой земельный участок. Он вместе с женой занимается посевом сельскохозяйственных культур. Этим видом деятельности он занимается два года. Низомудин берет кредит для закупа семян для посева пшеницы и закупа минеральных удобрения для урожая лука.
texts.en: Nizomudin is a resident of the Shahrituz region. He is 28 years old. He is married. He has three children. At Nizomudin's house is a small plot of land. He and his wife are engaged in planting crops. He has been engaged in this activity for two years. Nizomudin is taking a loan to purchase seeds for sowing wheat and purchase fertilizer for his crop of onions.

loans.use: to purchase of fertilizer and wheat seed.

loans.name: Isroil

texts.ru: Исроил проживает в районе Шахритус. Ему 38 лет. Он женат. У него пятеро детей. Жена Исроила домохозяйка. Сам он зарабатывает строительными работами по найму. Кроме того он занимается растениеводством. В этой области Исроил десять лет. Он берет кредит для посева озимой пшеницы.
texts.en: Isroil lives in the Shahrituz region. He is 38 years old. He is married. He has five children. Isroil's wife is a homemaker. He makes money as a construction contractor. In addition, he is involved in crop production. In this area, Isroil has worked ten years. He is taking a loan to plant winter wheat.

loans.use: to purchase seeds and fertilizer.

loans.name: Rohatkhon

texts.ru:
Рохатхон проживает в районе Рудаки. Ей 33 года. Она замужем. У нее четверо детей. Рохатхон занимается торговлей на рынке. В этой области она пять лет. Кроме того Рохатхон в свободное от работы время занимается шитьем национальных платьев. Она предоставляет услугу у себя дома. 
Рохатхон берет кредит для приобретения швейной машинки.
texts.en:
Rohatkhon lives in the Rudaki region. She is 33 years old. She is married. She has four children. Rohatkhon is involved in selling at the market. In this arena, she has worked five years. In her free time, Rohatkhon is also engaged in sewing folk dresses. She provides this service at her home.

Rohatkhon is taking a loan for the purchase of a sewing machine.

loans.use: to purchase a sewing machine for sewing folk dresses.

loans.name: Amanda

texts.es:
Amada tiene 49 años de edad, es casada y con 2 hijos dependientes. Vive en casa propia, la cual está ubicada en el Caserío Vallecito perteneciente al Distrito de Tambogrande. Amada vive en la parte rural  de este distrito y sólo cuenta con servicios básicos de luz.

La actividad que desarrolla Amada es la crianza de ganado ovino, vacuno y aves de corral, los cuales le producen leche y carne que comercializa en el mercado local, además se dedica a la agricultura, con siembras de limón, el mismo que cosecha semanalmente, cuenta con más de 8 años de experiencia en el manejo de su negocio.

Amada desea comprar alimento balanceado para los ovinos, vacunos y aves, además para realizar mejoras en domicilio, esto le permitirá que logren un mejor peso y tamaño para así seguir creciendo en su negocio y mejorar su calidad de vida.  Es por ello que ha solicitado un crédito en Edpyme Alternativa de 3000 nuevos soles para lograr su objetivo.
texts.en:
Amada, 49, is married and has two dependent children. She lives in her own house in Caserío Vallecito in the rural section of Tambogrande district, which has only basic electricity service. Amada raises sheep, cattle, and poultry, which produce milk and meat that she sells in the local market. She also farms and grows lemons that she harvests weekly. She has been in business for eight years.

Amada wants to buy nutritious feed for her livestock so that they will gain more weight and to make improvements to her house. She expects to grow her business and have a better life. She is applying to Edpyme Alternativa for a loan of 3000 nuevos soles to achieve her objectives.

loans.use: to buy nutritious feed for her livestock and make improvements to her house.

loans.name: Eddy Alberto

texts.es:
Eddy tiene29 años de edad, es soltero y no tiene hijos.  Vive en casa propia, la cual está ubicada en el Caserío La Payesa del distrito de Túcume, el cual se encuentra a 1 hora aproximadamente de la ciudad de Chiclayo, capital del departamento de Lambayeque.

La actividad a la que se dedica Eddy es la confección de prendas de vestir a pedido.  Además de ello, cuenta con una mototaxi la cual alquila.  Con los igresos de ambas actividades cubre sus gastos personales.  Se dedica a estas actividades desde hace 5 años y tiene experiencia para ello.

Eddy desea comprar tela y otros materiales para la confección de prendas de vestir, además de darle mantenimiento a su mototaxi.  Es por ello que ha creído conveniente obtener un préstamo de 4000 nuevos soles para lograr su objetivo.
texts.en:
Eddy is 29 years old and single. He doesn't have any children. He lives in his own home, which is located in Caserío La Payesa, district of Túcume. This is about an hour away from the city of Chiclayo, the capital of the department of Lambayeque.

Eddy works making clothing items by order. He also has a mototaxi that he rents. The income from both businesses allows him to cover his expenses. He has been doing both for five years and has the experience to do so.

Eddy wants to purchase fabric and other materials to make clothing items, and also do maintenance on his mototaxi. In order to achieve this goal he decided it was best to obtain a loan of 4,000 nuevos soles.

loans.use: to purchase fabric and maintain his mototaxi.

loans.name: Bineta

texts.fr: Bineta est une femme mariée.Elle a une fille.Elle vend des tissus et des articles de mercerie au marché de sa localité.Elle entretien sa famille avec les revenus tirés de ce commerce et parvient également à subvenir à ses propres besoins.Afin de reforcer son fonds de commerce, elle sollicite un pret de 150000f pour acheter des tissus et des articles de mercerie.
texts.en:
Bineta is a married woman. She has one daughter. She sells fabric and haberdashery items at the market of her locale. She takes care of her family with the profits made from this business and also manages to meet her own needs.

In order to strengthen her business, she is requesting a loan of 150,000f to buy fabric and haberdashery items.

loans.use: to buy fabric and haberdashery items.

loans.name: Obadiah

texts.en:
Thirty-two-year-old Obadiah is a small-scale farmer from Ndaragwa town in the Mt. Kenya Region. He has been in the farming business for seven years now, producing vegetables which he sells to the local market. He solely relies on the proceeds from his farm to cater to his basic needs. 

Obadiah has requested a loan of 35,000 KES (Kenyan Shillings) from Juhudi Kilimo to purchase farm supplies, which include fertilizers and seeds. He believes that having the right supplies for his farm will help improve his produce and this will earn him enough income to cater to his needs. He is planning to acquire more acres of land in the near future in order to increase his farming. 

Like any other farmer, Obadiah has several challenges in this business. He has experienced several losses due to bad weather conditions and lack of enough money to buy farm supplies that will help improve his produce. He is grateful to Juhudi that now he will comfortably face these challenges with their financial support.

loans.use: to buy farm supplies.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for maintenance.

loans.name: Raquel Isamara

texts.es: Raquel tiene 20 años, estudia la carrera de licenciatura en relaciones internacionales y comercio exterior, con el apoyo de sus padres ha podido costear sus estudios lo cual es de mucho interés para ella porque es una carrera muy amplia y le da la oportunidad de obtener un buen empleo y así apoyaría a su familia con sus ingresos, Raquel solicita apoyo de crédito para pagar el curso de titulación para poder cumplir su gran sueño y meta el ser una profesional.
texts.en: Raquel is 20 years old. She is enrolled in an international relations and commerce degree program. With the help of her parents she has been able to afford tuition costs for her studies, which are of great interest to her as it is a broad field and will give her the opportunity to obtain a good job. This way she will be able to help provide extra income for her family. Raquel is requesting a loan to pay for the costs of her degree program so she will be able to fulfill her draem and goal of being a professional.

loans.use: to pay tuition costs for a degree program.

loans.name: Marvin Alexander

texts.es: Marvin tiene 29 años de edad, casado, tiene un hijo y vive en el municipio de San Marcos, Santa Bárbara. Marvin realizaba trabajos de jornal en una compañía azucarera, luego trabajo varios años en Estados Unidos y regreso con su familia hace un año y estableció su propio negocio de pulpería, la cual es administrada por él y su esposa. Vende productos de la canasta básica familiar, como granos básicos, carnes, churros, manteca, huevos, lácteos, azúcar, harina, condimentos, verduras, refrescos, productos de aseo y otros abarrotes. El ha decidido solicitar un préstamo por 10,000 Lempiras para comprar carnes y productos enlatados para vender en su negocio. Tiene como meta hacer crecer más su negocio y ser la pulpería más grande de la comunidad, y  de las ganancias darle la educación a su hijo y lograr la compra de un terreno.
texts.en:
Marvin, 29, is married and has a child.  He lives in the municipality of San Marcos, in the department of Santa Bárbara. Marvin used to work as a day worker for a sugar company, later he worked in the United States for a number of years.  He returned to Honduras with his family a year ago and started up his own grocery store business.  He operates the business with his wife, and they sell staple consumer products such as: basic grains, meat, chips, butter, eggs, dairy products, sugar, flour, condiments, vegetables, drinks, cleaning products and other groceries.  

Marvin is requesting a loan for 10,000 Honduran lempiras to buy meat and canned goods to sell in his business.  His goal is to grow the business into the biggest grocery store in the community, and from the earnings give his child an education and buy some land.

loans.use: to buy food products such as meat and canned goods to stock his business

loans.name: Veronica

texts.es:
Verónica 28  años de edad.  Vive en casa familiar, tiene dos hijos que mantiene. Su vivienda está ubicada en la zona de Túcume,  cuenta con servicios de  luz, el lugar es una comunidad pequeña con un aproximado de 60  familias.

La actividad que desarrolla Verónica, es la crianza y venta de animales por toda la zona de Túcume y en el mercado de  Chiclayo, su cónyuge se dedica a la agricultura y al comercio de maíz, menestra entre otros de acuerdo a la temporada de cosechas.  Ambos trabajan arduamente por sacar adelante a su familia y darles una mejor calidad de vida.

Verónica quiere ampliar su ganado, para que aprovechando la temporada navideña pueda incrementar sus ventas y obtener mayores ingresos.  Es por eso que ha solicitado un crédito a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 2000 nuevos soles.
texts.en:
Verónica is 28 years old.  She lives in her family home and takes care of two children.  Her house is located in the Túcume zone and has electricity.  It is in a small community of approximately 60 families.  

The activity that Verónica carries out is the raising and sale of animals throughout the Túcume zone and in the Chiclayo market.  Her spouse makes his living in agriculture and trading corn, vegetables and other crops, according to the harvest season.  They both work hard to get ahead and give their family a better quality of life. 

Verónica wants to increase her livestock, so that she can take advantage of the Christmas season to increase her sales and receive more income.  This is why she has applied for a loan of 2000 nuevos soles from Edpyme Alternativa.

loans.use: to purchase livestock to sell.

loans.name: Henry

texts.es:
Elipio, de 62 años es un hombre responsable. Vive en compañía de su hija Jessica, en la casa que construyó hace muchos años atrás.
Hace 8 años falleció su esposa; desde ese entonces se siente triste, pero sabe que tiene que continuar con su vida, por su hija, el único familiar que le queda. Su economía se centra en la agricultura. Sus principales sembríos son, trigo, habas, olluco y papa. Los que cuida con mucho amor y esmero, pues es sabe que depende a sus cuidados el resultado que obtenga. Pero como es un hombre de campo, también se dedica a la ganadería sus principales animales constan de ganado vacuno y ovino, los que engorda para luego vender a los carniceros que lo visitan constantemente. Gracias a sus esfuerzo y él de su esposa, logró poseer muchos terrenos agrícolas, los cuales comparte con su hija, ya que le enseñó este moble oficio. Asimismo se dedica a la venta de productos de primera necesidad en una carpa que instala todos los días viernes que son la feria del lugar. Este es el cuarto crédito con MFP, donde se siente desarrollado, pues obtiene el apoyo económico que necesita para mejorar su negocio.
Elipio, invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de animales para poder aumentar su ganadería y por ende su negocio, además de alimentos de primera necesidad para su venta.
texts.en:
Elipio, who is 62, is a responsible man. He lives with his daughter Jessica in the home he built many years ago.

His wife passed away eight years ago and he has been sad ever since, but he knows he has to go on with his life for his daughter, who is the only family he has left. His livelihood is based on farming. He grows mainly wheat, fava beans, ulluco, and potatoes. He takes loving care for his crops beacuse he knows the results he will obtain depend on his effort. But since he is a country man, he also works raising animals, mainly cattle and sheep. He fattens them up in order to sell them to the butchers who come to him regularly. Thanks to his and his wife's effort, he was able to acquire a lot of farmland. He shares it with his daughter, since he has taught her this noble trade. He also works selling essential goods at a tent he sets up every Friday, which is the local market day.

This is his fourth loan with MFP, and he feels fulfilled because there he obtains the financial support that he needs in order to improve his business. Elipio will invest the money requested in purchasing animals to increase his livestock and his business, as well as essential goods to sell.

loans.use: to purchase animals and also products to stock his store.

loans.name: Julieta

texts.es: La Sra. Julieta tiene 41 años tiene cuatro hijos de las edades de 13, 11, 8 y 6 años,  ella se dedica a la producción y venta de ladrillos, ella vive por la zona de Chacacollo de la localidad de Sacaba,  este préstamo es su primera secuencia dentro de la institución, la Sra. Julieta va a utilizar este préstamo para compra de insumos y materiales  para la fabricación de ladrillos como leña y tierra,  su razón para solicitar este préstamo es pedido de ladrillos que tiene que entregar y que por falta de capital no lo puede realizar, la Sra. Julieta enfrenta retos en su negocio que son la competencia ya que por la zona existe varias ladrilleras, por ser una zona de fábricas de ladrillos, la Sra. Julieta va a utilizar los beneficios en la fabricación de ladrillos por mayor, la Sra. Julieta se siente feliz y agradecida con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en:
41-year old Sra. Julieta has four children aged 13, 11, 8 and 6. She earns her living by making and selling bricks. She lives in Sacaba in the Chacacollo area. This is her first loan with this institution.

Julieta is going to use the money to buy supplies and material such as firewood and earth to make bricks. She is seeking a loan as she has orders for bricks which she has to deliver but doesn't have enough capital to buy the necessary supplies. 

Julieta faces such challenges as competition from the other brick-makers in the area. She will use her earnings to make bricks to sell wholesale.  She is happy and grateful to the institution for the support it has provided.

loans.use: Buy sawdust, firewood, and earth to make bricks

loans.name: Banco Mujer Jehová Proveerá Group

texts.es: Judith es una de las integrantes de banco Mujer Jehová Proveerá,  tiene 27 años de edad, vive en unión libre hace 8 años, y tiene un hijo de 3 años. Su compañero trabaja como policía, con un salario muy bajo y ella se dedica a la cría de cerdos y pollos, además trabaja medio tiempo en la cocina del colegio de la comunidad, para ayudar a su familia y poder solventar los gastos del hogar. El crédito lo va invertir en la compra de animales y sus alimentos,  este es el segundo crédito que recibe y han sido de gran ayuda porque le permitieron formar su microempresa. Junto a Judith están 4 socias más q van a invertir en actividades agropecuarias.
texts.en:
Judith belongs to the communal bank Mujer Jehová Proveerá. She is 27 years old, has been in a common-law marriage for eight years, and has a three-year-old child. Her partner works as a police officer earning a very low salary and she works raising pigs and chickens. She also has a part time job in the kitchen of the local school so that she can help her family cover their household expenses. 

She will invest this loan in purchasing animals and feed for them. This is the second loan she receives and they have been of great help to her because they have allowed her to start her microbusiness.

Along with Judith, there are four more members who will invest in their farming and livestock businesses.

loans.use: to purchase pigs, chickens, feed, vitamins, etc.

loans.name: Sikweli

texts.en:
Sikweli is a 36-year-old married woman. She has three children with ages ranging from 6 years to 18 years. She describes herself to be a jovial and focused woman.

She operates a motorcycle that she uses to provide transportation services. She has been involved in this business for five years. Her business is located at a populated area and her primary customers are local residents. She describes her biggest business challenge to be delay of payment from customers. 

She will use the Kes 70,000 loan to buy another motorcycle to increase the mode of transportation. Her business goal is to expand her business within five years. She hopes that in the future, she will own a van.

loans.use: to buy another motorcycle.

loans.name: Mwaka

texts.en:
Mwaka is 48, years old, widowed, and has eight children, two of whom attend school. She owns a business in which she devotes herself to preparing breakfasts and lunches in a food stall. Her stall is located in the town market, which is very good location. She earns a good income. Her food is quite delicious and sanitary and so her customers are highly satisfied with her work. 

Mwaka is requesting a loan, which she will use to purchase vegetables, meat, seafood, basic staples, fruit, spices, and other ingredients for making a more extensive menu that would satisfy her customers' wishes and expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase vegetables, meat, seafood, basic staples, fruit, spices, and other ingredients

loans.name: Kimir

texts.en:
Kimir is 35 years old and married to Sikoe. She supports a family of five children. She is a mixed farmer and she has been in this business for the last eight years. Her monthly income is KES 30,000.
 
Kimir is currently servicing her fifth loan from KADET LTD of KES 50,000. This will help her to prepare the land and yield seedlings. 

She plans to use the anticipated profits to diversify into livestock farming. Her future dream is to improve the living standards of her family.

loans.use: to purchase farm inputs.

loans.name: Luis

texts.es:
Luis, de 43 años vive en su casa propia al lado de su esposa María y sus 5 hijos; Rosmery, Miyube, Magaly, Neils y Jesús, a los que cuida en su casa propia. 
Desde hace 5 años, se dedica a la construcción de casas, al principio era ayudante, pero con el tiempo y el aprendizaje se hizo maestro de construcción, y hoy dirige obras medianas con un grupo de ayudantes (3 personas),  dice que le gusta mucho el trabajo ya que obtiene buenas ganancias económicas, y sus servicios son buscados ya que el acabado, de las obras encargadas, es muy optimo  porque  cuenta con las herramientas necesarias que hacen posible el buen desempeño. Paralelamente a esta actividad, se dedica también al engorde de ganado vacuno y ovino, que comercializa en los mercados de su ciudad, para esto cuenta con la ayuda incondicional de su esposa, que sin descuidar la crianza de sus hijos, también vigila el ganado. Para el futuro Luis tiene planeado ampliar el negocio de construcción. Este es el cuarto crédito con MFP; esta muy agradecido con todas aquellas personas que hacen posible que pueda acceder al crédito para continuar trabajando. Por esa razón promete ser puntual con el pago de sus cuotas.
Luis, invertirá el dinero en la compra de material de construcción (madera y arena) para culminar sus trabajos de construcción.
texts.en:
43-year old Luis lives in his own house with his wife María and their five children, Rosmery, Miyube, Magaly, Neils and Jesús. For the past five years Luis has earned his living building houses, as an assistant at first, but as time passed and he completed his apprenticeship, he became a qualified builder. He now manages projects with help from three assistants. He says he really enjoys his work as he earns good money and his skills are much sought after. The houses he has completed are always very well done as he has his own tools to do the best work possible.

As well as this work, Luis raises cattle and sheep which he sells in the local markets. His wife provides him with great support in this venture. Without ever neglecting their children, she keeps watch over the livestock.

In the future Luis plans to expand his construction business. This is his fourth loan with MFP, and he is very grateful to all those people who make the loans possible so he can continue his work. For this reason he promises to make his repayments punctually.

He will use the money to buy construction material (wood, sand) so he can complete his building projects.

loans.use: buy construction material (wood, sand) so he can complete his building projects

loans.name: Edith

texts.es: Edith, de 26 años vive con sus padres y su hijo, a los que quiere mucho y cuida en la casa que con mucho esfuerzo construyeron sus padres y donde ella vive desde que nació. Desde hace dos años, decidió abrir su propio negocio, meses atrás ella estaba apoyando a sus padres en las tareas agrícolas y con unos ahorros que disponía logró invertir en el negocio de su tienda que actualmente desempeña en la casa de sus padres, la atención que brinda es diaria y  es la única que atiende su establecimiento aunque en algunas ocasiones la apoya sus madres, tiene muchos planes para el futuro con su negocio, una de ellas es tener una tienda más grande y llena de mercadería. Es su cuarto crédito con MFP, esta muy contenta de  saber que tiene un apoyo financiero ya que siempre ha demostrado  ser responsable en sus pagos, además  le agrada ser parte de su banco comunal porque  todos sus integrantes son personas responsables y muy solidarias, agradece  a aquellas personas que serán gestoras del préstamo que solicita y le será  muy útil en el progreso de su negocio. Edith, invertirá el dinero en la compra de más abarrotes, sobre todo en panetones para la época navideña.
texts.en:
Edith is 26 years old and lives with her parents and her son whom she loves dearly. She takes care of him in the house built by her parents through a lot of hard work, which is also the house that she grew up in. She started her own business two years ago, and before that she used to help her parents with agricultural work. She used her savings to start her own store which she runs from her parents’ house. 

Her store is open every day, and she runs it on her own with occasional help from her parents. She has a lot of future plans for her business, and one of them is to have a bigger store which is full of merchandise. 

This is her fourth loan with MFP, and she is very happy to know that she can count on financial support. She also likes being a member of the communal bank because all the members are responsible and supportive. She is grateful to the people who will lend her the money she is requesting which will be very useful in helping her business grow. 

Edith will invest the money in buying more staple goods, especially panettones for the Christmas season.

loans.use: to buy panettones, chocolate, milk and other staple goods for her convenience store.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy booths for her internet cafe

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy fertilizer.

loans.name: Johany Del Carmen

texts.es: El joven Johany tiene 26 años de edad, es soltero, actualmente labora en un restaurante en atención al cliente, su salario mensual no es lo suficiente para pagar sus estudios con costo cubre su alimentación y transporte diario, afortunadamente cuenta con el apoyo de sus  padres para pagar sus estudios universitario, es por eso que Johany solicita apoyo de crédito para poder pagar su curso de titulación ya que es parte de su sueño el brindar ayuda a los demás con sus conocimientos adquiridos siendo un profesional y también aspiraría a un mejor puesto de trabajo.
texts.en: Young Johany is 26 years old and single. He currently works at a restaurant serving customers, but his monthly salary is not enough to pay for school, food, and daily transportation. Fortunately, his parents help him pay for college, but Johany is requesting a loan in order to pay for his final course and earn his degree, because part of his dream is to become a professional so that he can use the knowledge he has acquired to help others. It will also allow him to access a better job.

loans.use: to pay for his final course and earn his degree.

loans.name: Maria

texts.es:
María, de 49 años es una mujer admirable. Vive en compañía de su esposo Jesús, con quien se casó desde hace 25 años. Ambos tienen 3 hijos, y juntos viven en su casa propia. Hace un año, falleció su hija producto de una enfermedad, para poder curarla tuvo que vender sus cuyes, se siente triste al recordarlo. Ahora tiene solo 38 ejemplares, pero está trabajando para aumentar y para ello quiere construir más posas donde vivirán. Pero no solo cría cuyes también vacas, toros y gallinas de buena calidad, de ahí obtiene ganancias por la venta de leche y de los animales. Además su esposo trabaja en el gobierno de su ciudad, donde la pagan un sueldo mensual. Ya los fines de semana los dos se dedican a la siembra de maíz y alfalfa en sus terrenos agrícolas propios, la alfalfa le ayuda en el alimento de sus hijos, pero el maíz lo comercializa en su misma chacra, ya que es de muy buena calidad y ya tienen compradores fijos. Ahora desea mejorar la infraestructura de su casa. Ella pertenece al grupo solidario “San Lorenzo” y este es el décimo crédito con MFP, por tanto espera de un pequeño préstamo para que pueda cumplir con sus objetivos. Por otro lado promete cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas, como en anterior crédito que tuvo. Además le agrada ser parte de su asociación porque  todos sus integrantes son personas responsables y solidarias.
María; invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de más cuyes para aumentar su ganado, además de crear más corrales para que vivan.
texts.en:
María, 49, is an admirable woman. She lives with her husband Jesus to whom she has been married for 25 years. The two of them have three children and they all live together. A year ago her daughter died of a illness. To obtain a cure she had to sell her guinea pigs which is sad for her to remember. Now she has only 38 specimens but she is working to raise that number and so she must build more places for them to live. She raises not only guinea pigs but also high-quality cows, bulls and chickens and obtains a profit selling the milk and the animals. In addition her husband works for city government where they pay him a monthly salary. On weekends the two of them plant corn and alfalfa on their own farm land. The alfalfa helps to feed their children but the corn is sold at their own farm since it is of very high quality and has its regular customers. 

Now she would like to improve the infrastructure of their home. She belongs to the "San Lorenzo" communal bank; this is the tenth loan with MFP and so she hopes for a small loan in order to achieve her objectives. Additionally she promises to make her payments as she did with a previous loan. Furthermore she is pleased to be a part of her association because all its members are responsible and mutually supportive persons. 

Maria will invest the requested money in the purchase of more guinea pigs to increase her herd in addition to constructing more pens where they may live.

loans.use: to purchase more guinea pigs and materials to build more pens.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to expand her agriculture business by buying more fertilizer to cultivate more rice to sell.

loans.name: Ondieki

texts.en: Ondieki is a 28-year-old single man, who describes himself as a determined man. For five years, he has been operating a retail store where he sells electronics. His business is in a viable business area, and his primary customers are local residents. He describes his biggest business challenge as inadequate funds for improving the business. He will use the KES 20,000 to buy electronics to sell. His business goal is to run a bigger electronics shop within five years. He hopes that in the future, he will run a big electronics shop.

loans.use: to buy electronics to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks, and beverages.

loans.name: Cesar Felix

texts.es:
Cesar tiene 28 años de edad de estado civil casada tiene tres hijos, vive, la esposa y con los hijos  en la ciudad de Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos.

ESTA VRC SAN ANTONIO, SUS MIEMBROS SE DEDICAN A LA AGRICULTURA TODOS VIVEN EN EL SECTOR DEL RECINTO AGUAS FRIAS. PRACTICAMENTE SE HAN CRIADO EN ESA ZONA, SE DEDICAN A LABORES AGRICOLAS Y PECUARIAS EN SU MAYORIA.

Cesar  se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz y en la cría de gallina y chanchos.  Solicita el crédito para comprar insecticidas, urea, herbicidas además comida como balanceado para los animales. Con la ayuda del crédito podrá comprar lo necesario para los cultivos y cría para los animales.  Las compras las hará en la ciudad de Ventanas.

El sueño e s poder comprar más terreno. Los desafíos a los que se enfrenta son las plagas en los cultivos y la competencia por la venta de los animales. En el tiempo libre le gusta ver la televisión y dormir.
texts.en:
Cesar is 28 years old, married, and has three children. He lives with his wife and children in the city of Ventanas in De Los Rios province. The members of the San Antonio communal bank work in agriculture. They all live around the rural settlement of Aguas Frias. Almost all of them have grown up in that area, and the majority work in agriculture and livestock-raising. 

Cesar is a farmer, growing corn and raising hens and pigs. He is applying for the loan in order to buy insecticides, urea, herbicides, as well as balanced feed for the animals. 

With the help of the loan, he will be able to buy what he needs for his crops and to raise his animals. He will make his purchases in the city of Ventanas. 

His dream is to be able to buy more land. The challenges he faces are crop pests and competition in selling his animals. In his free time he likes to watch television and sleep.

loans.use: To buy insecticides, urea, herbicides, as well as balanced feed for his animals.

loans.name: Nelly

texts.es:
Nelly es una mujer de amplia dedicación laboral, a sus 26 años comparte una linda convivencia con Wilmer  de 28 y su retoña y motivo de vida Maribel de 1 añito, habita junto a su familia en una vivienda hecha a base de adobe en calidad de alquiler. Desde hace 10 años viene desempeñándose en el rubro de producción  de cacao orgánico que  por cierto es uno de los más cotizados en su región por poseer un sabor y aroma único ,como apoyo principal e infalible esta Wilmer con quien gestiona todo lo necesario respecto a los cultivos y casi siempre laborando de sol a sol  incluso los domingos y feriados. Todo esto porque durante el tiempo que viene desempeñándose en el campo comprendió que mientras uno tenga la salud estable debe sacarle el máximo provecho con trabajo y alegría, no olvidando que todo su esfuerzo aplicado finalmente esta reflejado en las ganancias que obtiene permitiéndole ahorrar a largo plazo.
Actualmente planea realizar una lista de tareas para con sus cultivos el cual incluye el reemplazo de algunas plantaciones de hoja de coca por el de cacao debido a considerarlos algo obsoletos, este proceso requiere la compra de almácigos criados de forma tecnificada añadiendo a ello el respectivo deshierbo de las plantaciones mas productivas del momento.
Desea a futuro cumplir uno de sus sueños que es la compra de una vivienda en la urbanización de su localidad puesto que es una de las cosas que siempre quiso en beneficio de su pequeña hija. Este viene a ser su cuarto préstamo con MFP, agradecida por ser parte de la entidad financiera y demostrar un buen historial crediticio. Se siente muy comprometida con el trabajo que viene desarrollando con su grupo comunal puesto que se siente muy motivada por trabajar con personas muy responsables y comprometidas con su crédito.
Con los 500 nuevos soles complementará su capital destinado a la compra de plantas de almácigo y la respectiva contrata de jornaleros para el mantenimiento y deshierbo de sus plantaciones de cacao.
texts.en:
Nelly is a 26-year-old woman who is devoted to her work.  She has a nice life living with Wilmer, 28, and her one-year-old daughter, Maribel, who is her reason to live.  She lives with her family in a rented adobe house.  She’s been growing organic cocoa beans for ten years which by the way is one of the best priced in the region for its unique flavor and aroma.  Her main, unfailing support is Wilmer with whose help she negotiates everything related to the crops; they almost always work from sun to sun including Sundays and holidays.  She does all this because in all the time she’s been working in the fields she came to realize that as long as her health remains stable, she must get the most out of it with hard work and joy never forgetting that effort applied is reflected eventually in profits obtained that make it possible for her to save up in the long run.

She currently plans to make a list of tasks for the crops that includes replacing some of the coca leaf plants with cocoa bean plants because she considers them to be a bit obsolete.  This process requires the purchase of seedlings that have been raised technologically and she must add the respective weeding of the currently most productive plots.

She hopes in future to reach one of her dreams which is the purchase of a dwelling in her local residential area because it’s one of the things she’s always wanted for her daughter’s wellbeing.  This will be her 4th MFP loan and she’s grateful to be part of the financial institution and to have a good credit history.  She feels committed to the work the communal group has been doing because she feels motivated to work with people who are responsible and committed to their loans.  She will use the 500 new soles to add to her capital earmarked for seedling purchase and will use the rest to hire day laborers for crop maintenance and to weed the cocoa bean plots.

loans.use: to buy seedlings and to hire laborers.

loans.name: Regard De Jesus 1,2, 3 & 4 Group

texts.fr:
Macius est le coordinateur de son groupe Regard de Jesus. Il est un veuf et il a 2 enfants. Macius habite dans la région nord d’Haiti où de l’électricité est rare et de l’eau est très limitée. Macius a dirigé son commerce pendant les dernières 12 années. 

Il voudrait utiliser cet emprunt pour investir dans l'epicerie dont il vend des produits divers. Macius espère que cet emprunt l’aidera à obtenir un plus grand commerce. Des autres membres de sont groupe ont besoin d’un emprunt pour tels commerces comme le charbon le produits divers et cosmétiques. Macius dit que ses défis principal sont les manques d,achats et trop de personnes lui ont demande le credit. Il dit que son but principal est d'avoir un plus d'argent pour obtenir un grand commerce avec l`aide de Dieu.
texts.en:
Macius is the coordinator of his group Regard de Jesus. He is a widow and he has 2 children. Macius lives in the northern region of Haiti where electricity is rare and water is very scarce. Macius has managed his business for the last 12 years.

Macius would like to use this loan to invest in the grocery store where he sells a variety of items. Macius hopes that this loan will help him to obtain a larger business. Other members of his group need a loan for businesses such as charcoal, diverse items and cosmetics. Macius says that his main challenges are the lack of purchases and too many people asking him for credit. He says that his main goal is to have more money to obtain a large business with the help of God.

loans.use: to invest in the purchase of a variety of items such as cosmetics and clothing.

loans.name: Kwekwe

texts.en:
Kwekwe is a hard-working individual as a result of great financial difficulties she experienced at home. She decided to start working by selling charcoal so that she could generate income to help out financially. Kwekwe started her business five years ago. Due to difficulties with accumulating capital, she has not been able to grow her business much so that she can respond to the many orders she has received from her customers. However, with great effort and long hours, she has found ways to overcome these obstacles.

Kwekwe is requesting a loan in order to buy more sacks of charcoal so that she can fill some of the larger orders she has received from her customers.  She also dreams of providing a better quality of life for her family.

loans.use: to buy more sacks of charcoal

loans.name: Narantuya

texts.en: Narantuya is a 38-year-old woman who lives with her husband and three children in a ger in the Uvs province of Mongolia. Her husband, Ganbaatar, aged 38, provides an intercity transportation service. Her two daughters, Gantuya and Budhishig, are sixteen and nine, and they go to a local school. Her son, Narmandah, aged four, goes to kindergarten. She has been operating a clothes retail business since 2004 in the local market, but this year she has closed her business and stayed for months at home. She is now planning to start a grocery store business at a rented stall in the local food market. She is requesting loan of MNT 3,000,000 to buy a large amount of organic dairy products and other groceries for her new business. She is an open-minded, friendly, and hardworking person.

loans.use: to buy large amount of organic dairy products and other groceries for her new business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a dairy cow.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more green banana for resale.

loans.name: Nyamjargal

texts.en:
Nyamjargal is 29 years old. She is a communicative and welcoming person. She lives with her husband and two daughters in a house in the Selenge province of Mongolia. Her husband, Uyangasaihan, works at a private flour mill as an assistant. Her two daughters, Emuujin and Tselmuun, aged 4 and 2, go to kindergarten. 

Nyamjargal has been growing organic vegetables since 1991 for family use. In 1998, she expanded her volume of planting and harvest to sell to Darkhan province retailers. In 2011, she started selling organic vegetable in the local market. 

She is now planning to store a large amount of fresh organic vegetables and to make preserved products from organic vegetables to sell during winter. She is asking for 1,000,000 MNT to renovate and prepare her storage pit to store the fresh organic vegetables and preserves.

loans.use: to renovate and prepare her storage pit to store organic vegetables and preserves to sell during winter

loans.name: Dzidze

texts.en:
There is always new hope for those who make up their minds to live another day so that they can fulfill their goals and plans for their families, overcoming violence in society. This is the case with Dzidze, who lives together with her husband and her four children, who are her greatest treasure. She is a determined woman whose pledge is to give the best of herself so that her family will not lack the necessities of life.

Currently, she works selling food in an area of the country.  She tells of the satisfaction of having a regular clientele; her place is located close to a market zone, which means that at lunchtime, every worker arrives at her stall to buy lunch because she is the only person with reasonable prices.

Dzidze wishes to expand her food stall by buying tables, chairs, and more raw ingredients so that she can vary her menu and have a little more money coming in. She doesn't have enough money for this investment, and that's why she approached Yehu to request a loan to buy those items. She gives her thanks in advance and hopes to be able to pay back the debt as soon as possible.

loans.use: to buy tables, chairs, and more raw ingredients.

loans.name: Sialo

texts.en:
Sialo is 36 years old, married and supports a family of five children. She is a mixed farmer and she has been in the business for the last eight years. Her monthly income is KES 19,000.
 
She is currently servicing her third loan from KADET LTD of KES 60,000, which will help her to prepare the land and get seedlings for planting. 

She plans to use the anticipated profits to diversify into livestock farming. Her future dream is to improve the living standards of her family.

loans.use: to purchase farm inputs.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a dairy cow.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase additional stock of timber.

loans.name: Benard

texts.en: Benard is a 33 year-old married man. He has two children, with ages ranging from ten to 15 years. He describes himself to be a determined man. He operates a retail store where he provides repair services to vehicles and transportation with his bicycle. He has been involved in this business for ten years. His business is located at a viable business and his primary customers are local residents. He describes his biggest business challenge to be a poor road network. He will use the Kes 7,000 loan to buy bicycle spare parts. His business goal is to improve his business within 5 years. He hopes that in the future, he will expand his business.

loans.use: to buy bicycle spare parts

loans.name: Justine

texts.en:
Justine, age 48, is a clinical officer by profession and he says he loves his work very much. He says he has a small clinic which he has run for several years. Justine decided to buy a motorcycle taxi and hired a gentleman to operate it. His motorcycle transports people in the inner town of Kaloleni and in rural areas of the town. It has been a good business because most rural parts of Kaloleni lack vehicle transport.

He wants to purchase another motorcycle and therefore he is requesting a loan in the amount of 30,000 KES, which he says he will top up from his small amount of savings. He hopes to increase his income and provide better living standards for his family.

loans.use: to purchase another motorcycle

loans.name: Killian

texts.en:
Killian is a 47-year-old married man. He has five children. He describes himself as a social and business-oriented man. 

Killian operates a retail business where he sells soft drinks. He has been involved in this business for two years. His business is located in a highly populated area and his primary customers are local residents. In addition, Killian sells cereals, which increases his business income. He describes his biggest business challenge to be insufficient funds for improving the business. 

He will use the 20,000 KES loan to buy soft drinks. His business goal is to improve his business within five years. He hopes that in the future, he will expand his business.

loans.use: to buy soft drinks to sell in his business

loans.name: Myagmarjav

texts.en:
Myagmarjav is 25 years old and lives with her husband and two children in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. They live in a ger, a traditional Mongolian tent, in the ger district of the city, with no running water, minimal roads and spotty electricity. 

Since 2004 Myagmarjav has operated a poultry farm. After years of successful operations, she has been able to purchase home furniture and a vehicle. But over the years, many people have taken up poultry-farming and her income has decreased. 

She is asking for a loan of 4,000,000 MNT to build a food store. By doing this, her family income will increase. Her family is the most important thing to her and she says, “As a mother, I would like to be financially able to provide a good education and other necessary expenses for my children until they grow up." For this reason she wants start this new business.

loans.use: to start a food store

loans.name: Ehsonhoja

texts.ru: Эхсонходжа родился в рабочей семье, после окончания средней школы поступил в  Таджикский Государственный Университет Политики и бизнеса. Он является студентом 1 курса по специальности политолога. Эхсонходжа учится отлично и хорошо. Он очень активно участвует в жизни университета. Его однокурсники очень уважают и дорожают его дружбу, так как он очень верный друг. Он читает много книг и занимается спортом. Его родители хотят, чтобы их сын стал хорошим политологом, и верят в него, но их доход не позволяет им оплатить за учебу сына. Эхсонходжа запрашивает займ для оплаты учебы в университете. Он ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Ehsonhoja was born into a worker's family and after graduation was accepted to the Tajik State University for Politics and Business. He is now a freshman/first-year political science major. Ehsonhoja has excellent grades and is actively participating in university life. His fellow students respect him and treasure his friendship, because he is a very good and reliable friend. Ehsonhoja reads a great deal and participates in sports. His parents want Ehsonhoja to become a political scientist and believe he will be successful, but their income is insufficient to pay for their son's education. Ehsonhoja is requesting a loan to pay for his tuition and he hopes for your kindness.

loans.use: to pay for his tuition

loans.name: Cholponai

texts.ru: Чолпонай 43 года. В качестве основного источника дохода для своей семьи, Чолпонай  занимается животноводством, начав этот бизнес в 2000 году. Благодаря упорному труду Чолпонай , ее бизнес, начатый с суммы 15,000 сом позволяет ей иметь прибыль в сумме 5,000 сом (KGS) с месяц с продажи молока и молочных продуктов. На сегодняшний день, в ее хозяйстве имеется 2 дойные коровы, 10 овец, также Чолпонай  возделывает 1,20 га земли, где выращивает хлопок. В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Чолпонай обратилась в компанию «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 130,000 сом (KGS) на покупку дополнительных голов скота и минерального удобрения. Доходы от кредита Чолпонай  планирует вложить в дальнейшее расширение бизнеса.
texts.en: Cholponai is 43 years old. As the main source of income for her family Cholponai has been raising livestock since 2000. She has worked hard to develop her business, started as a 15,000 som investment to now yield 5,000 som (KGS) monthly, mainly from dairy sales. Currently Cholponai owns two milk cows, 10 sheep and also grows cotton on a 3 acres/1.2 hectare plot. To further develop her business Cholponai has turned to "Bai-Tushum and partners" for a loan of 130,000 som (KGS) which she will use to buy more livestock and fertilizer. She is planning to use the profits from this loan to continually expand her farming business.

loans.use: to purchase livestock

loans.name: Khuram

texts.ru: Хурам проживает в городе Куляб. Ему 47 лет. Она вдовец. У него пятеро детей. Хурам предоставляет услугу. Он занимается частным извозом. Этим видом деятельности Хурам занимается четыре года. Он берет кредит для приобретения запчастей автомашины, чтобы отремонтировать свою машину. Также он хочет отремонтировать дом.
texts.en: Khuram lives in Kulob, he is 47 years old, widowed and has five children. Khuram has been working as a taxi driver for four years. He is taking out this loan to purchase car spare parts to repair his taxi cab. He will also use part of this loan to perform repairs on his house.

loans.use: to purchase automotive spare parts and repair his house

loans.name: Barihan

texts.ru: Барихан - 47-летний фермер, живущий в селе Ак-Колот что на юге страны.Замужем, мать 4 детей.Трое детей  взрослые и заботятся о себе и своих семьях сами.Лишь младший сын живет с ней вместе. Во время весенне полевых работ вся семья помогает маме. По характеру человек очень спокойный, старательный и отзывчивый. В 1992 году, в поисках дополнительного источника существования для своей семьи, Барихан начала свой бизнес в разведении и продаже скота.После развала СССР Барихан получили землю от совместного хозяйства. На сегодняшний день в хозяйстве имеется 30 голов овец и 2 коровы. В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Барихан обратился в компанию «Бай – Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS). На доходы от кредита в этом году Барихан планирует  увеличить поголовье скота и  как поделилась нами Барихан, планирует женить младшего сына.
texts.en: Barihan is a 47 year old farmer who lives in the village of Ak-Kolot in the south Kyrgyzstan. She is married and a mother of four children. Three of her children are adults and are taking care of themselves and their own families. Only Barihan's youngest son is still living at home. The entire family helps their mother during the spring planting season. Barihan has a calm, hardworking and responsive personality. She has been raising livestock since 1992 and the herd has become the main source of income for the family. After the fall of the Soviet Union Barihan received a plot of land from the co-op and also owns 30 sheep and 2 cows. In order to further expand the herd she has turned to "Bai-Tushum and partners" for a loan of 100,000 som (KGS). She is planning to use the profits from this loan to buy even more livestock and hopefully marry off her last son next year.

loans.use: to purchase livestock

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase materials such as nylon, cotton, prefabricated ornaments, and other items.

loans.name: Daniel David

texts.es:
Daniel David tiene 32 años de edad de estado civil soltero no  tiene hijos, vive con los padres  en la ciudad de Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos.

ESTA VRC SAN ANTONIO, SUS MIEMBROS SE DEDICAN A LA AGRICULTURA TODOS VIVEN EN EL SECTOR DEL RECINTO AGUAS FRIAS. PRACTICAMENTE SE HAN CRIADO EN ESA ZONA, SE DEDICAN A LABORES AGRICOLAS Y PECUARIAS EN SU MAYORIA.

Daniel se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz. Solicita el crédito para comprar insecticidas, urea, herbicidas. Con la ayuda del crédito podrá comprar las semillas para el cultivo de maíz. Las compras las hará en la ciudad de Ventanas cada 15 días.

El sueño es  comprar terrenos para seguir sembrando. Los desafíos a los que se enfrenta son las enfermedades de los cultivos. En el tiempo libre le gusta ver televisión, practicar el deporte.
texts.en:
Daniel David, 32, is single and has no children; he lives with his parents in the city of Ventanas, Los Ríos Province.  He’s in the “San Antonio” communal bank whose members work in agriculture and live in the Recinto Aguas Frías sector.  They’ve practically been raised in this zone and for the most part work in agriculture and animal husbandry.

Daniel works growing corn.  He requests the loan to buy insecticide, urea and herbicide.  With help from the loan he will be able to buy seeds to grow corn.  He will make his purchases in Ventanas every two weeks.

His dream is to buy land to continue planting and the challenge he faces is plant diseases.  In his free time he enjoys watching television and playing sports.

loans.use: to buy insecticide, urea and herbicide.

loans.name: Veronica

texts.es:
La Sra. Verónica vive en Ambato con su esposo y sus dos hijos, ella es  una persona muy carismática, alegre, dedicada a su trabajo, responsable todo lo que ella hace es por el amor a su familia y trabaja duro para poder mejorar la calidad de vida de sus hijos. 

Verónica se dedica a confeccionar prendas de vestir pantalones jeans, hasta el momento le está yendo muy bien ya que está distribuyendo a algunas tiendas de ropa, es por ello que solicita un crédito a Fodemi para la compra de materia prima tela jeans para confeccionar los pantalones ya que se acerca la temporada de navidad y está teniendo bastante demanda de sus productos y es una oportunidad que debe aprovechar.

El sueño que la Sra. verónica tiene es el tener un taller más grande, donde pueda seguir confeccionando sus pantalones jeans, y brindar trabajo a sus vecinas que también lo necesitan, con estos ingresos mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia y dar a sus hijos una buena educación.
texts.en:
Verónica lives in Ambato with her husband and two children.  She’s a very charismatic, cheerful woman who is dedicated to her work; she’s responsible and everything she does is motivated by love for her family and she works hard to be able to improve her children’s quality of life.

Verónica works manufacturing jeans.  To date, she’s doing very well since she’s selling to certain clothing stores and this is why she’s asking Fodemi for a loan to buy raw materials like denim to make the pants since the Christmas season is approaching and she has quite a bit of demand for her products and this is an opportunity she must not pass up.

Verónica’s dream is to have a larger workshop where she can continue making jeans and provide employment for her neighbors who also need it and with this income to improve their families’ quality of life and provide their children with good education.

loans.use: to buy denim and other sewing supplies.

loans.name: Erika Jeanina

texts.es:
Erika Jeanina tiene 24 años de edad de estado civil unión libre   tiene un hijo, vive con los padres  en la ciudad de Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos.

ESTA VRC SAN ANTONIO, SUS MIEMBROS SE DEDICAN A LA AGRICULTURA TODOS VIVEN EN EL SECTOR DEL RECINTO AGUAS FRIAS. PRACTICAMENTE SE HAN CRIADO EN ESA ZONA, SE DEDICAN A LABORES AGRICOLAS Y PECUARIAS EN SU MAYORIA.

Erika se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz y la crianza de pollos. Solicita el crédito para comprar insecticidas, urea, herbicidas y balanceados de crianza y engorde para los pollos. Con la ayuda del crédito podrá comprar las semillas de maíz y comida para los animales. Las compras las hará en la ciudad de Ventana.

El sueño es contar siempre con bueno salud para seguir trabajando. Los desafíos a los que se enfrenta son las enfermedades de los cultivos y la competencia por los precios de los animales. En el tiempo libre le gusta realizar la limpieza en la casa
texts.en:
Erika Jeanina, 24, is in a free union and has a son; she lives with her parents in the city of Ventanas, Los Ríos Province.  She’s in the “San Antonio” communal bank whose members work in agriculture and live in the Recinto Aguas Frías sector.  They’ve practically been raised in this zone and for the most part work in agriculture and animal husbandry.

Erika works growing corn and raising chickens.  She’s requesting the loan to buy insecticide, urea, herbicide and chicken feed to raise them and fatten them up.  With help from the loan she will be able to buy corn seeds and animal feed.  She will make her purchases in the city of Ventanas.  Her dream is to always be in good health in order to continue to work.  The challenge she faces is crop diseases and competition in animal prices.  She likes cleaning her house in her free time.

loans.use: to buy insecticide, urea, herbicide and chicken feed.

loans.name: Rosa

texts.es:
Rosa de 37 años  es una gran mujer. tiene dos hijas, Diana de 19 años y Sandy de 15 , posee una vivienda construida a base de material noble que logro culminarla con la suma de esfuerzo y trabajo a lo largo de 10 años
Es actualmente una ama de casa que tiene la responsabilidad de velar por el bienestar de sus hijas y algunas atenciones que requiere su actual pareja con quien planea en adelante trabajar con todo el entusiasmo posible. El sustento vigente son unas parcelas cuya producción ha presentado una disminución respecto a sus cultivos de cacao debido a que fue victima del ataque de una plaga denominada “escoba de bruja” que afecto de manera considerable su producción.
Por considerarse una madre comprometida con su trabajo optó por reiniciarse comercialmente planeando en adelante dedicarse a la venta de gelatinas, chupetes y bebidas heladas para lo cual requiere adquirir una congeladora para sacarle el máximo provecho posible y tener un estable sustento para su familia.
El único objetivo por el cual dedica su trabajo con el máximo empeño posible son sus hijas para quienes planea brindarles una buena educación logrando así tener una mejor vida contraria a la que tuvo ella de niña.
Este es su octavo crédito, puntual y responsable por tratarse de dinero que la ayudó mucho en sus objetivos a corto plazo espera seguir siendo parte de MFP, agradece a sus compañeros de su banco comunal por ser siempre personas de mucha responsabilidad pues gracias a ello es un grupo muy sólido. 
Con los 2,000 nuevos soles realizará la compra de una congeladora para iniciarse en el negocio de gelatinas y bebidas heladas.
texts.en:
Rosa, 37, is a great woman.  She has two daughters: Diana, 19, and Sandy, 15.  She has a house built of substantial materials that she managed to finish thanks to ten long years’ of hard work and effort.  She’s currently a housewife who must watch after her daughters’ wellbeing and some needs of her current partner with whom she plans to work with the best possible enthusiasm.  Her source of income is some productive fields.  The cocoa bean yields suffered some losses due to an infestation by a disease called “Witch’s Broom” which affected the crop yields considerably.

Considering herself to be a mother who is committed to her work, she opted to reenter commerce and is planning on selling gelatin treats, frozen pops and cold beverages in future and to do so needs to acquire a cooler to get the best possible profits and have a stable source of family income.  Her only objective in working to the maximum possible is her two daughters that she plans to provide with a good education so that they will have a better life than what she had as a girl.
